question: In which state / UT, Damage Control Simulator (DCS) for the Indian Navy is to be set up?
explanation:
A Damage Control Simulator (DCS) for the Indian Navy would be set up in Port Blair of Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
The Commander in Chief of Andaman and Nicobar Command â€“ Lt. Gen. Manoj Pande laid the foundation stone for the DCS. It would be established by Goa Shipyard Ltd.
